reviewText:
This is must see for any Michigan Hockey fan and all college hockey in general. It highlights the Maize and Blue along the way, but in reality it's more about the beginnings of hockey as an NCAA sport and the roots of the National Tournament, the CCHA, the GLI, and the student-athlete.

Michigan is the GREATEST ALL-TIME COLLEGE HOCKEY PROGRAM with 9 national championships, 35 NCAA Tournament appearances & 22 consecutive tournament  appearances currently, and 22 Frozen Four appearances. That's the most in all of these categories. Here's to our 10th national championship very soon!
